name: American Soft Linen Luxury 6 Piece Towel Set, 2 Bath Towels 2 Hand Towels 2 Washcloths, 100% Cotton Turkish Towels for Bathroom, Silver Grey Towel Sets
about_this_item: ‚úÖ Turkish Luxury 6 Piece Towel Set Includes 2 Bath Towels of 27 x 54 inches, 2 Hand Towels of 16 x 28 inches and 2 Washcloths of 13 x 13 inches.
‚úÖ 100% Cotton Turkish Towel Set is 600 GSM. These Bathroom Towels are Soft, Absorbent, Thick and Quick Drying enough for your Body , Hand and Face after Shower.

‚úÖ These Towels are OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 Certified and Tested for Harmful Substances. Premium Quality Fluffy Towels will make you feel and give you comfort as if you are in luxurius hotel, spa, gym, sauna, pool etc.

title: Verified Purchase
content: Tired of regular size bath towels not able to wrap around your gorgeous curvy bodies? Then this is the towel for you! Wraps everything up and is very absorbant. They also have a bigger towel than this, but this size fits and overlaps my round body perfectly. Washes well in warm water not hot. Loses some fuzz in dryer like all towels do. title: Verified Purchase
content: Surprised, towel set isn't as thick and fluffy as I had expected. Also, when I washed them before I put them with my other towels there was all kinds of fuzzy fluff coming from the towels. So I washed them again and my washer was full of this fluff. When I dried them the lint trap was almost 1/2" thick with fluff and there was still all kinds of fluff on the towels. I shook the towels and whipped snapped them sharply and finally got all the excess fluff off them. But I expected better. 1 star, just because it left so much fluff in the washer, had to cycle it twice but there is still fluff in the washer. Not returning the towels but I will not purchase them again.
